vtschooldata: Fetch and Process Vermont School Data

Source: R/vtschooldata-package.R
vtschooldata-package.Rd

Downloads and processes school data from the Vermont Agency of Education (AOE). Provides functions for fetching enrollment data from the Vermont Education Dashboard (VED) and transforming it into tidy format for analysis.

Main functions

fetch_enr

Fetch enrollment data for a school year

fetch_enr_multi

Fetch enrollment data for multiple years

tidy_enr

Transform wide data to tidy (long) format

id_enr_aggs

Add aggregation level flags

enr_grade_aggs

Create grade-level aggregations

get_available_years

Get available data years

Cache functions

cache_status

View cached data files

clear_cache

Remove cached data files

ID System

Vermont uses organization IDs (ORG_ID) that identify:

  • Supervisory Unions (SU): Administrative units overseeing multiple school districts

  • School Districts (SD): Individual school districts

  • Schools: Individual school buildings

Vermont has approximately 60 supervisory unions/school districts and 300+ public schools.

Data Sources

Data is sourced from the Vermont Agency of Education's Vermont Education Dashboard:

  • VED Enrollment: https://education.vermont.gov/data-and-reporting/vermont-education-dashboard/vermont-education-dashboard-enrollment

  • Data Portal: https://education.vermont.gov/data-and-reporting

Data Characteristics

  • Enrollment is measured on October 1 of each school year

  • Data available from 2016-17 school year (end_year = 2017) to present

  • Includes PreK through Grade 12 and adult education

  • Kindergarten may be split into full-time and part-time counts

  • Small cell sizes (< 11 students) may be suppressed with "***"
